name: places/ChIJORGeCoj2wokRxkcEkY0MKUk
adrFormatAddress: 3672 Broadway, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: First time going in there and was greeted and welcomed like family. Real people to people contact not just go into an office, fill out paperwork, sit down, be called and leave. My referral even lacked in specificity to cover the actual area I needed an MRI on and the receptionist so kindly called the office for me and got me a new referral so I got the help I came for. Nothing like the NYC don't talk to me attitude, so friendly and a wonderful experience! Will definitely travel the further distance if I have to get an ultrasound, x-ray or MRI again! I highly suggest this location over the others.

I highly suggest this location over the others.

originalText.text:
If you have the option go somewhere else.  I arrived for my "appointment" 5 mins ahead.  Filled out the paperwork, then proceeded to wait a total of 40 mins to be Xrayed.  When after 30 of those minutes I asked the receptionist how long I was told "soon".  I then asked how many were in front of me, and was told that it would be any minute now.
10 mins later I finally I was xrayed and asked the technician whom I had seen walking around during those 40 mins if I could see the last slide she had taken.  This is while the second slide was in the viewer mind you, and she then lied to me telling me that the slide of me facing sideways (spine clearly visible) was the one of me facing forward.  The only one that covered the bottom of my ribs was the last one, which is what I was concerned about, and there for.  I would rather she had just told me no frankly.  Note to all.  When you enter an establishment and the receptionist is allowed to wear headphones the whole time.  Be aware the service will probably leave a little to be desired.  Perhaps a different location.

originalText.text: I've had Several visits at this clinic. Always cordial. One visit the staff served sandwiches they ordered, because of the wait. I move from NY and talked to the receptionist about finding my records 3 yrs. ago!..less than 5 min. she took my info. found my record and told me how to get them. Very courteous. Thank you very much.

originalText.text: I was greated warmly and professionally. The staffwas very helpful and relaxed although it was extremely busy overall I would use them again in the future if needed

text.text: I was greated warmly and professionally. The staffwas very helpful and relaxed although it was extremely busy overall I would use them again in the future if needed

originalText.text: First time there the machine wasn’t working properly they told me to come back later 15 minutes later they call me and told me the machines are working again to please come back  I came back got the MRI  3 weeks later my doctor have to call them to find out what happened with the MRI  they told my doctor mri was inconclusive that I have to take again not a best way to make business
